p: For the GC-MS analysis, the screening of the J. mimosifolia extracts resulted in the presence of esters, organic compounds, fatty acids, monosaccharides, carotenoids and phytosterols. The mass spectrum range of the components was compared with the compound registry of the NIST and CAS library where 54 components were identified. The names of the recognized compounds, molecular weight, retention time, and concentration are presented in Table 3.
